findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The contract owner has privileges to modify tax and liquidity fees without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing divisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing address.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the buyBack feature.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist and unblacklist addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to blacklist and unblacklist addresses.

findings.title: reflectionFromToken function is public
findings.description: The reflectionFromToken function is declared as public, which may expose it to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: tokenFromReflection function is public
findings.description: The tokenFromReflection function is declared as public which may lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: excludeFromReward function is public
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has been declared as public, which may lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the reward mechanism.

findings.title: _approve function has onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The _approve function has an onlyOwner modifier which allows only the owner to call this function.

findings.title: _transfer function has onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The _transfer function has an onlyOwner modifier which restricts access to the owner of the contract.

findings.title: swapTokens function has lockTheSwap modifier
findings.description: The swapTokens function has a lockTheSwap modifier which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: buyBackTokens function has lockTheSwap modifier
findings.description: The buyBackTokens function has a lockTheSwap modifier which may lead to unintended behavior or restrictions.

findings.title: swapTokensForEth function has lockTheSwap modifier
findings.description: The swapTokensForEth function has a lockTheSwap modifier which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: addLiquidity function has lockTheSwap modifier
findings.description: The addLiquidity function has a lockTheSwap modifier which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: _tokenTransfer function is private
findings.description: The _tokenTransfer function is declared as private, which may limit its accessibility and usage within the contract.

findings.title: _transferStandard function is private
findings.description: The _transferStandard function is declared as private which may lead to unintended access control.

findings.description: The _transferFromExcluded function is declared as private which may lead to unintended access control.

findings.title: _reflectFee function is private
findings.description: The _reflectFee function has been declared as private, which may limit its accessibility and usage.

findings.title: _getCurrentSupply function uses a loop
findings.description: The _getCurrentSupply function uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: _takeLiquidity function has lockTheSwap modifier
findings.description: The _takeLiquidity function uses the lockTheSwap modifier which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.description: The removeAllFee function uses the lockTheSwap modifier.

findings.description: The restoreAllFee function uses the lockTheSwap modifier.

findings.title: isExcludedFromFee function is public
findings.description: The isExcludedFromFee function is declared as public, which may expose sensitive information or allow unauthorized access.

findings.description: The excludeFromFee function has an onlyOwner modifier, which may lead to restricted access and potential security risks.

findings.title: includeInFee function has onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The includeInFee function has an onlyOwner modifier which may lead to security issues.

findings.title: setTaxFeePercent function has onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function has an onlyOwner modifier, which may lead to unauthorized access and modification of tax fee percentage.

findings.title: setLiquidityFeePercent function has onlyOwner modifier
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function is restricted to only the owner of the contract, which may lead to unintended access control.
